title: My projects
menuTitle: My Projects

I am a graduate from BK Birla Institute of Engineering & Technology Pilani, India, with a B.Tech in Information Technology. I am active in the filed of Web Technology, Renewable Energy(Solar), Electronics, Robotics, and Running.
Thank you. I will answer to the message as soon as possible.

I am a graduate from BK Birla Institute of Engineering & Technology Pilani, India, with a B.Tech in Information Technology. I am active in the filed of Web Technology, Renewable Energy(Solar), Electronics, Robotics, and Running.

My Interests:

  • Web Development
  • Renewable Energy
  • Robotics
  • Running

My Projects:

  • MPPT Controller
  • Energy monitoring System
  • Open Robotics Board
  • Open IoT Development Board
Thank you. I will answer to the message as soon as possible.

children.value:
title: How to customize the PersonalBlog starter's appearance
subTitle: GatsbyJS starter instruction
cover: photo-1463852247062-1bbca38f7805-cover.jpg
uses a theme object so base customization is really easy.

root
  ├── src
  │   ├── styles
  │   │   ├── colors.js
  │   │   ├── globals.js
  │   │   └── theme.js
To read the whole instruction article -
How to customize the personalBlog starter’s appearance

keys.value:
The starter uses a theme object so base customization is really easy.

Find the theme.js file.

root
  ├── src
  │   ├── styles
  │   │   ├── colors.js
  │   │   ├── globals.js
  │   │   └── theme.js

…

Front-end web development

To read the whole instruction article - How to customize the personalBlog starter’s appearance - you have to move to Front-end web development with Greg website.

…
